short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to know if it's a good day to deploy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay informed about deployment risks with Deploy Day Indicator. This Chrome extension provides real-time recommendations on whether it's a favorable day for software deployment. Get timely insights to ensure smooth releases and minimize potential issues. Streamline your deployment process with confidence!
